About.Name: Thomas Robertson
About.AboutText:
Hi, I am Thomas Robertson. I am a computer science student with an interest in software development and programming. I am pursuing my undergraduate degree at Seattle Pacific University. I am expanding my knowledge and skills in a variety of areas of computer science.

I enjoy examining new ways to code and I prefer to work in well-managed collaborative environments.

Outside of class, I spend most of my time reading whatever is at hand. I believe that learning new things is a critical part of life, and try to do so when I have the time.

Experience.EducationText: I started SPU in fall 2023, and have been enjoying it so far.
Experience.EmploymentText: I am presently a full-time student
Experience.SkillsText: Use this to add some narrative to your skills section

Project1.Title: Big Data Graph Traversal
Project1.Desc: An early team project for a class, we created a node traversal for one of Google's big data sets. Implemented rather naively, it does do the job it was meant to do... albeit with some inefficencies.

Project2.Title: Seekr
Project2.Desc: My in-progress Senior Capstone project, an app by team Whitespace that helps with job applications.
